# Change Log
All notable changes to the "bunker-color-theme" extension will be documented in this file.

Check [Keep a Changelog](http://keepachangelog.com/) for recommendations on how to structure this file.

## [Unreleased]

## [0.2.0] - 2025-10-09
- Adopt pnpm and modernize project metadata (`package.json`, ESLint setup).
- Refresh theme colors for latest VS Code UI surfaces and semantic tokens.
- Update README with development workflow.

## [0.1.0] - 2017-??-??
- Initial release.
